Section

Sanity check by Jonathan Coulombe

A Reference to [Section] A Citation[#Citation] A Figure figure A Table [table] A Link link A Nowhere [Nowhere]

B Reference to [][Section] B Citation[][#Citation] B Table [][table] B Nowhere [][Nowhere]

C Reference to [Section][] C Citation[#Citation][] C Figure figure C Table [table][] C Link link C Nowhere [Nowhere][]

D Reference to [option][Section] D Citation[option][#Citation] D Figure option D Table [option][table] D Link option D Nowhere [option][Nowhere]

E Reference to [Section][option] E Citation[#Citation][option] E Figure [figure][option] E Table [table][option] E Link [link][option] E Nowhere [Nowhere][option]

F Reference to Section F Citation#Citation F Figure figure F Table table F Link link F Nowhere Nowhere

H Reference to H Citation H Figure H Table H Link H Nowhere

[table] | a | b | |---|---| | x | y |
